\w Before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* disease, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* flames \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* at \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H0776"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* quite uncovered. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*. \w By|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* cut \w through|strong="H1234"\w* \w with|strong="H0776"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w were|strong="H2022"\w* moved \w with|strong="H3027"\w* fear; \w the|strong="H7200"\w* clouds \w were|strong="H2022"\w* streaming \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w deep|strong="H8415"\w* \w was|strong="H4325"\w* sounding; \w the|strong="H7200"\w* sun did \w not|strong="H4325"\w* come \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* moon \w kept|strong="H5414"\w* still \w in|strong="H6963"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w You|strong="H0776"\w* went stepping \w through|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*, crushing \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H1758"\w* passion.

\w You|strong="H5704"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H5704"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w one|strong="H7563"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* whom \w your|strong="H5704"\w* holy oil \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w put|strong="H3318"\w*; wounding \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w family|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* evil-doer, uncovering \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w base|strong="H3247"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

\w You|strong="H0398"\w* \w have|strong="H0398"\w* put \w your|strong="H0398"\w* \w spears|strong="H4294"\w* through \w his|strong="H0398"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w his|strong="H0398"\w* horsemen \w were|strong="H7218"\w* sent \w in|strong="H7218"\w* flight \w like|strong="H3644"\w* dry stems; \w they|strong="H6041"\w* \w had|strong="H0398"\w* joy \w in|strong="H7218"\w* driving \w away|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, \w in|strong="H7218"\w* making \w a|strong="H3644"\w* meal \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w them|strong="H0398"\w* secretly.

\w The|strong="H1869"\w* feet \w of|strong="H4325"\w* your \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w were|strong="H4325"\w* \w on|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H1869"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w on|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H1869"\w* mass \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

Still, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w glad|strong="H1523"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* joy \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*.
